You then move onto a long open stretch of single carriageway, where you pass a motorcyclist. Later, you are travelling behind a long vehicle and want to overtake. Once in town, there are trams directed by traffic light signals and you have to drive across their tracks. Further on, a bus is signalling its intention to pull out from a bus stop.
question.part: What could happen to the motorcyclist in these weather conditions?

answer.text: They may have to turn around
They may travel faster than usual
They could be blown off course
